entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Tulita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:31 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tulita Airport 12:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -19.0°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -22.6°C
Wind: W 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over southern sections. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
